channel.title: Can't run my server or any other server
channel.description: Ok, so i was trying to start up my server and everything but as soon as the batch file would open it immediately closed down? iv tried with several servers 317, 508, 525.. they all just don't want to work, iv tried restarting my computer iv made sure i didn't have any code messed up, i honestly don't know what the problem would be. So, im asking if anyone has had or seen this problem and or knows how to fix it. Thanks.

item.title: Can't run my server or any other server
item.dc:creator: @tehpwner9119 tehpwner9119
item.description:
@tehpwner9119 wrote:

oh yeah. i just checked it and i guess i forgot to update the path and it was supposed to say 16 and not 11. I got it now thanks.

Read full topic
